attributes.action: Instigate a review of the current TV licensing structure, forcing the public to do business with a company they may not agree with.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I feel that being forced into having to pay a TV license as standard is nothing more than an infringement of our rights as consumers to choose which TV company we do "business" with.

Many people may not agree with having to give money to a company that they either dislike as a company for legitimate reasons, or spend no time in viewing their programs.

Yet, we still have to give them our money.

In these modern times, I feel that we, as a consumer should have the option to CHOOSE which companies we spend our money with, regardless of what industry they are in, and not be forced into doing so just because that’s how it's always been.
